remarks: Limit of the quotient of two funcions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
divlimc.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
divlimc.g $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
divlimc.h $e |- H = ( x e. A |-> ( B / C ) ) $.
divlimc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
divlimc.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
divlimc.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
divlimc.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( G limCC D ) ) $.
divlimc.yne0 $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= 0 ) $.
divlimc.cne0 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C =/= 0 ) $.
divlimc $p |- ( ph -> ( X / Y ) e. ( H limCC D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
